bookTitle: Buck Rogers in the 25th Century: The Complete Newspaper Dailies, Vol. 7: 1938-1940
bookSeries: Buck Rogers: The Complete Newspaper Dailies #7
Plot: The saga of Buck Rogers in the 25th Century, the world's most famous science-fiction newspaper strip, continues with Volume 7 of Hermes Press' critically acclaimed, complete reprint of this ground-breaking title. Included in this volume are two more years of the strip, from 1938 to 1940, featuring three complete adventures ("Overturned World," "Martian War Threat," and "Super-Dwarf of Space"), plus a special 16-page introductory essay detailing interesting details about the history of the strip and its impact on science and science-fiction. The strips contained in this volume have never been printed before and have been painstakingly restored to perfection.
